Package strategies

Class Strategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • strategies.Strategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggressiveStrategy, BenevolentStrategy, CheaterStrategy, Human, RandomStrategy
    public abstract class Strategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represent a game play strategy, different strategies have different implementation reEnforcement, Attack and Fortification .
    Author:
    vanduong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • goToBattle

        public int[] goToBattle​(int[] attackerDice,
                        int[] defenderDice)
        compares 2 results of dices to decide who wins the battle returns the result in an array of 2 elements: [0] contains number of attacker's lost armies, [1] contains that of defender.
        Parameters:
        attackerDice - the attacker dice
        defenderDice - the defender dice
        Returns:
        the number indicating the winner

                   Country attackingCountry,
                   Country attackedCountry,
                   int attackerSelectNumDice)
        Deduct armies on both sides based on dice results and attacker occupies defender's country if possible.
        Parameters:

        attackingCountry - the attacking country
        attackedCountry - the attacked country
        attackerSelectNumDice - the attacker select num dice

        Parameters:

      • reEnforce

        public abstract void reEnforce()
